price: Hai manusia, ingatlah akan nikmat Allah kepadamu.  Adakah pencipta selain Allah yang dapat memberikan rezeki kepada kamu dari langit dan bumi? Tidak ada Tuhan (yang berhak disembah) selain Dia, maka mengapakah kamu berpaling (dari ketauhidan)?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡۚ هَلۡ مِنۡ خَٰلِقٍ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu udh'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi ʿalaykum hal min khāliqin ghayru al-lahi yarzuqukum mina al-samāi wal-arḍi lā ilāha illā huwa fa-annā tu'fakūna
